app.name: Louez.io

errors.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already in use

deposit.title: Deposit (Authorization Hold)
deposit.description: Manage the deposit authorization hold for this reservation
deposit.pendingDescription: Payment was received but the card could not be saved for the deposit. You will need to collect the deposit manually or ask the customer to provide a card.
deposit.cardSavedDescription: The customer's card is saved. You can create a hold to block the deposit amount.
deposit.authorizedDescription: The deposit amount is held on the customer's card. You can capture it for damages or release it at the end of the rental.
deposit.capturedDescription: The deposit amount has been captured from the customer's card.
deposit.releasedDescription: The authorization has been released, no charges were made.
deposit.failedDescription: The authorization failed. The customer may need to use a different card.
deposit.captureDescription: Capture all or part of the deposit to cover damages or losses.
deposit.captureReasonPlaceholder: Describe the damages or reason for capture...
deposit.captureReasonHint: This reason will be recorded in the history and visible to the customer.
deposit.releaseDescription: Are you sure you want to release the {amount} deposit? The authorization will be cancelled and no charges will be made.

paymentBadge.depositFullyReturned: The deposit has been fully returned

apple.step1: Open the Calendar app on Mac or iPhone

outlook.step3: Paste the link and give the calendar a name

legalSettings.title: Legal pages
legalSettings.description: Write your terms of service and legal notices
legalSettings.cgvHelp: Terms are displayed at checkout and accessible on your store
legalSettings.legalNoticeHelp: Required legal information about your business
legalSettings.templatesDescription: Use our templates as a starting point
legalSettings.templatesDisclaimer: These templates are provided for guidance only. Adapt them to your business and consult a legal professional if necessary.
legalSettings.editorDescription: Write your text in Markdown for automatic formatting
legalSettings.tip1: Use headings (# Title) to structure your documents
legalSettings.tip2: Include your complete contact details in the legal notice
legalSettings.tip3: Clearly state cancellation and refund conditions
legalSettings.tip4: Mention insurance and liability in case of damage
legalSettings.tip5: Don't hesitate to consult a lawyer to validate your documents

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.enableSectionDescription: Enable or disable tax management for your store
taxes.rateSectionDescription: Set the default tax rate applied to your products
taxes.defaultRateDescription: This rate will be applied to all products unless specifically configured
taxes.displayModeSectionDescription: Choose how prices are displayed to your customers
taxes.displayModeInclusiveDescription: Displayed prices include tax. Recommended for individual customers (B2C).
taxes.displayModeExclusiveDescription: Displayed prices exclude tax. Recommended for business customers (B2B).
taxes.exampleInclusive: Product at {price}  incl. tax with {rate}% VAT = {ht}  excl. tax + {tva}  VAT
taxes.exampleExclusive: Product at {price}  excl. tax with {rate}% VAT = {price}  + {tva}  VAT = {ttc}  incl. tax
taxes.taxLabelDescription: The tax name displayed on documents (default: VAT)
taxes.depositNoTaxInfo: Deposits are not subject to VAT as they are returned to the customer.

conditions.condition2: The tenant agrees to return the equipment in the condition in which it was received
conditions.condition3: In case of damage or loss, the deposit may be retained in whole or in part

legal.text1: This document serves as a rental contract and invoice. It attests to the agreement between the parties for the rental of the equipment described above under the conditions mentioned.
legal.text2: In case of late payment, late payment penalties at the legal rate in force will be applied. Fixed compensation for recovery costs: 40 euros.
legal.tvaNotApplicable: VAT not applicable, art. 293 B of the CGI
